An application of [[Kagutsuchi]] through [[Susanoo]], whereby Sasuke produces weapons made from the orb of [[Amaterasu|black flames]] held in his Susanoo's secondary right hand.

== Variants ==
* The black flames can form a sword to be wielded by Susanoo, which is able to stab and slice through individuals or defences, incinerating whatever remains.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 585, page 7</ref><ref>''Naruto'' chapter 634, page 8</ref>
* [[Blaze Release: Yasaka Magatama|Magatama-shaped projectiles]] can be unleashed from the orb in volleys, knocking back and subsequently incinerating their targets.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 574, page 10</ref>
* This technique can produce arrows to be utilised with Susanoo's bow.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 634, pages 11-12</ref>

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3]]'', the sword version is named "[[Sword of Kagutsuchi]]".
* When portrayed in the anime, the orb held by Susanoo and the blade it produces appear to be made of the same ethereal substance as the rest of Susanoo, rather than black flames as it appears in the manga and games.<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 326</ref> Instead, the orb briefly changes into black flames when using certain techniques.<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 331</ref>
